name: Goldfinch Staker
description: Swaps {{token}} to FIDU Stablecoin, which represents a share of the senior tranche, and stakes in [Goldfinch Finance](https://app.goldfinch.finance/stake) to earn GFI staking rewards. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.
